danfulea.misc.graphics3d

Class Gear

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphObject
      • javax.media.j3d.Node
        • javax.media.j3d.Group
          • javax.media.j3d.TransformGroup
            • danfulea.misc.graphics3d.Gear
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpurGear

    public class Gear
extends javax.media.j3d.TransformGroup
    Class for visualize a 3D Gear. It is based on old java3D tutorials freely available on the web (at that time).
    Author:
    Dan Fulea, 12 MAY. 2005
